# orientation

**Instance Property**

The orientation attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
var orientation: NSPrintInfo.PaperOrientation { get set }
```

## Managing the Printing Rectangle

- **paperSize**: The size of the paper.
- **topMargin**: The top margin to the specified size.
- **bottomMargin**: The height of the bottom margin.
- **leftMargin**: The width of the left margin.
- **rightMargin**: The width of the right margin.
- **imageablePageBounds**: The imageable area of a sheet of paper specified by the print info.
- **NSPrintInfo.PaperOrientation**: Constants that describe the orientation of printing on a page.
- **paperName**: The name of the currently selected paper size.
- **NSPrinter.PaperName**: The type you use to specify the name of a type of paper.
- **localizedPaperName**: The human-readable name of the currently selected paper size, suitable for presentation in user interfaces.
